messages.msgSnippet: ... Oops. I think a couple of threads have gotten mixed up here. This reference was to Pullman s Dark Materials Trilogy. Tia
messages.messageBody:
>Tia, there are four more books he wrote the fourth one from the
>perspective of Bean the fifth is about the tree people who are introduced
>later in the series.
>
>Teresa
> >Ah, Tia. That's so sweet and cool!! You know there are two more books
> >in the series, right?
>
> Oh yes. We actually have the second, so now I'm looking for the third
> second hand. Eventually I'll also get the first so we'll have the whole
> series. I loved them too.

Oops. I think a couple of threads have gotten mixed up here. This reference
was to Pullman's Dark Materials Trilogy.
Tia

messages.subject: Enders Game was: Two great moments: No. 1
messages.msgSnippet: Tia, there are four more books he wrote the fourth one from the perspective of Bean the fifth is about the tree people who are introduced later in the series.
messages.messageBody:
Tia, there are four more books he wrote the fourth one from the perspective of Bean the fifth is about the tree people who are introduced later in the series.

Teresa
>Ah, Tia. That's so sweet and cool!! You know there are two more books
>in the series, right?

Oh yes. We actually have the second, so now I'm looking for the third
second hand. Eventually I'll also get the first so we'll have the whole
series. I loved them too.
Tia
